data.title: Bus Stop Advertising (Local Councils)
data.text:
Our 215 bus shelters which host advertising can help you run successful and cost-effective outdoor advertising campaigns across County Durham.

Why advertise with us?

County Durham has a population of over 500,000 people

We attract over 19 million visitors every year

Our bus shelters are passed by over 22,500 drivers every year

Our advertising bus shelters provide 430 opportunities to target your audience across the county

All our shelters are lit, ensuring your campaign reaches your audience 24 hours a day, seven days a week

We offer flexible, affordable and effective advertising opportunities to help you raise your brand awareness, promote products and launch products or services. We are not for profit and the money we raise through advertising is reinvested into the services we offer residents and businesses in County Durham.

Where you can advertise

Find out where all our advertising bus shelters are and how many people pass them each day on our interactive map.

Find out more or book

If you would like to book any locations, have any queries on how to use bus shelter advertising or would like to discuss your needs, please contact us.
